16:47 <Enygma`> gdelhumeau: any particular reason why we removed the edit parent button in inline edit mode?  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> AFAIR, no  
16:50 <Enygma`> I see it was moved from editmeta.vm to edit.vm  
16:51 <Enygma`> wonder why it`s not working, looking into it  
17:00 <Enygma`> uh, messy... the inline editor is handled specially in edit.vm (since it is wanted to replicate view mode as much as possible)... the check below that adds the edit parent button inside edit.vm is never reached for the inline editor, because it is redirected to editinline.vm from the start, so I need to add the edit parent button in editinline.vm explicitly.  
17:00 <Enygma`> fixing...
